turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order two small pizzas with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 3 medium pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, two small pizzas with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them I'd like a vegetarian, but can I get extra olives and extra yellow peppers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 1 veggie lovers and extra olives and bellpeppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then one meat lover's light pepperoni and extra sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 1 meatlovers with extra sauce and light pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $36, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We'll have delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be delivered in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
